middle_income: How would you describe your target population demographics? Please indicate the percentage of your target population that falls in each demographic (should add up to 100%). - Middle-income (Middle-income people are individuals living at or above national median income)
urban: How would you describe your target population demographics? Please indicate the percentage of your target population that falls in each demographic (Should add up to 100%). - Urban
suburban_periurban: How would you describe your target population demographics? Please indicate the percentage of your target population that falls in each demographic (Should add up to 100%). - Suburban/peri-urban
rural: How would you describe your target population demographics? Please indicate the percentage of your target population that falls in each demographic (Should add up to 100%). - Rural
full_time_total: Number of Full Time Employees (all staff):
full_time_female: Number of Full Time Female Employees:
part_time_total: Number of Part Time Employees (all staff):
part_time_female: Number of Part Time Female Employees:
number_directors: Total number of Board of Directors.

outside_capital: In the last year, how much outside capital (e.g. non-self-funded) have you raised (in USD)?
pitch_investors: How confident do you feel about the following aspects of raising capital (whether you are a for-profit, nonprofit, NGO, hybrid, etc.)? - Giving an elevator pitch to a large group of investors
pitch_competition: How confident do you feel about the following aspects of raising capital (whether you are a for-profit, nonprofit, NGO, hybrid, etc.)? - Giving an elevator pitch in a pitch competition
apply_grant_gov: How confident do you feel about the following aspects of raising capital (whether you are a for-profit, nonprofit, NGO, hybrid, etc.)? - Applying for multi-year grants through government
apply_grant_foundation: How confident do you feel about the following aspects of raising capital (whether you are a for-profit, nonprofit, NGO, hybrid, etc.)? - Applying for multi-year grants through foundations
apply_fellowships: How confident do you feel about the following aspects of raising capital (whether you are a for-profit, nonprofit, NGO, hybrid, etc.)? - Applying for fellowships
unique_served: How many unique clients/customers/beneficiaries did your organization serve directly in the last year?
